summary:
Driven and hands-on, I am a multicultural professional with over 15 years of experience in Marketing & Media working across industries (software technology, fintech, television, IT security, hospitality/restaurants, customer service, etc.) with international clients from the Netherlands ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡±, SwitzerlandðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡­, USA ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸, Mexico ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡½, El Salvador ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡», and other LATAM countries.
